template.epsilon: (float) Small value to prevent divsion by zero
template.starting_med_ior: (float) Medium IOR of the first table at the top of the image
template.ending_med_ior: (float) Medium IOR of the last table at the bottom of the image
template.med_ior_rows: (int) Number of rows of Medium IORs to compute
template.starting_num_density: (float) Number Density of the molecules at the top of the Med_IOR table
template.ending_num_density: (float) Number Density of the molecules at the top of the Med_IOR table
template.angle_count: (int) Number of angles to compute the LUT at. column_count < angle_count leads to decreased noise, but may smooth detail.
template.column_count: (int) Width of the lookup table. Increase to increase detail. If angle_count < column_count, linear interpolation is used.
template.drop_density: (float) Number density of the particle. See wiki for more details.
